    • getCube

      public java.util.List<Geometry> getCube​(double width)
      A function that receives a rectangle and constructs from it a cube according to the width it receives
      Parameters:
      width - the cube's width
      Returns:
      List of points that make up the cube

    • moveByJ

      public Rectangle moveByJ​(double zMove)
      the rectangle class call to this function in purpose of use it to move the rectangle like it was a book's page
      Parameters:
      zMove - The height to which we lift the top cover of the book
      Returns:
      new rectangle in the new position according to the distance we lifted the page
